entry.tran: 匈牙利的;匈牙利人的;匈牙利语（或文化）的
entry.def: Hungarian means belonging or relating to Hungary, or to its people, language, or culture.
A Hungarian is a Hungarian citizen, or a person of Hungarian origin.
Hungarian is the language spoken by people who live in Hungary.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Hungary
2. the official language of Hungary (also spoken in Rumania); belongs to the Ugric family of languages
1. relating to or characteristic of Hungary;
